title: Vegetation Management Planning using LiDAR
description: A planner uses LiDAR data to identify trees that are encroaching on transmission line right-of-ways and need to be trimmed.

tasks.description: Process aerial LiDAR data for a transmission corridor.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a 3D point cloud of the corridor, including conductors and vegetation.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify any vegetation that violates the minimum clearance distance to the conductors.
tasks.expected_outcome: System identifies 25 specific trees that are inside the clearance zone.

tasks.description: Generate work orders for the vegetation management crews, including maps and GPS coordinates for each tree that needs to be trimmed.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates and dispatches prioritized work orders.
